PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-06282014-05-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  DESD,  LAB
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Occupational Health and Safety Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to address issues raised by The Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations to correct (1) inconsistencies between French and English versions of the regulations; (2) unclear language to ensure that legal obligations are well understood; and (3) an ambiguity introduced by recent amendments to Part II of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0142 Publication Date: 2014-06-18
AttachmentsAttachment
